sentences.sContent: a ruthless dictator who eliminated all his rivals
sentences.sCn: 铲除所有异己的残酷独裁者

sentences.sContent: ...Conversion of paper to electronic medical records will help eliminate redundant tests and prevent drug interactions...
...but it does help to eliminate poverty...
...China is playing an increasingly important role in helping the international community to eliminate extreme poverty by 2030...

remMethod.val: e(出) ＋ limin(看作limit， 界线) ＋ ate(做) → 划出界线之外 → 消除， 排除

trans.tranOther: to completely get rid of something that is unnecessary or unwanted
